title: Boards are dead?
body: I'm only new to the boards as I am relatively new to League of Legends and I was just wondering if these boards are going to become noticeably more lively?

replies.body:
Most likely not anytime soon as most regulars left after forum was closed. 

So what you're left with is the occasional people who comes up here to ask questions, those who made GD the GD ain't longer here (mostly).

You can post on the NA board tho, I do that sometimes if I get too bored, while OCE Board is too slow.

The only hope to Board becoming more lively is that a new group of regulars is formed in the near future.

This right here. The majority of regulars left when forums were made read only, the way boards are now is significantly less lively than forums ever were. I've seen a few new people become board regulars but it's nothing significant so I can't expect boards will be anything close to how lively the forums were anytime soon, I'd expect to be waiting months (maybe years) for that to happen.
I'm sad to say I'm one of the regulars who left {{item:3070}}
